text: Stelios Okkarides () (born November 15, 1977 in Nicosia, Cyprus) is a retired Cypriot football defender who last played for Doxa Katokopia. He played mainly for APOEL where he stayed for 7 years. He also played for Apollon, Olympiakos Nicosia and for Doxa Katokopias. ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Cyprus international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:APOEL FC players Category:Olympiakos Nicosia players Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Doxa Katokopias FC players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Sportspeople from Nicosia
title: Stelios Okkarides
